content.rendered:
FALL FASHION TRENDS

Fall is finally here! I feel like time is going by so fast with the holidays just around the corner again. On this blog post I’m featuring my favorite trends like the plaid, red, and black trend for Fall.

Click on the designer and store names to shop. The Look 1 is from FWRD.COM as well as look #2. I love, love how they style their looks with different designers…not just showcasing one item. Earrings (Alessandra Rich) and both Fendi bags are from FWRD.COM 

Black flats/shoes $152 are from Tony Bianco Nordstrom.com. They are called Dion mule! These shoes look EXACTLY like the $700+ Balenciaga flats but for a fraction of the price! These are very classic shoes with a little bit of an edge…which I love.

P.S. Don’t forget you can shop my best selling lashes and beauty products here!

LOVE DIONNE
